name: Stuntman Water Wipeout Run
description:
Let it go get into the real stunts man water run wipe-out game with awesome stunts, runs in super cool water park obstacle arena among the water challenge 2018 games. Don’t be afraid of open waters and accept the master challenges of water wipers, wrecking balls and bouncing punches! Get into the serious wipe out challenge in this legendary stunts man game along with extreme water slide stunts man run, when obstacles are on the way. Feel the real obstacle course difficulty in this legendary stuntman game.

Stuntman Water Run wipeout is the best action adventure game with the awesome stuntman and amazing physics.

Legendary stuntman water run wipe out game is best fun obstacle course water world game among the water slide extreme stunts games of 2017. Balance yourself carefully on moving balancing platforms and be aware of boxing punches otherwise you will be smashed Badly. Play the extreme water challenge obstacles arena simulation with ultimate survival stunts or real wipe out water world. Get ready wear on your helmet and flap jacket and do not get wipeout before you qualify in the awesome hurdles event as real legendary stunts man.

In stuntsman water run wipe out park run hurdle game think and jump fast, jump high, and slither on the ground like a ninja in this obstacle course game with extreme legendary obstacles as a real stunt man. Choose your hero and compete the hurdles task with others for glory. This extreme elimination challenge is only for true gladiators; So buckle up and go!

Real Stuntman Runs wipe out gives you the best graphics, all you need is to control your character's balance and speed, be careful while making high jumps do not fall into water, sharp turns at closing of massive hurdle slides in this realistic 3D amazing Wipeout and run adventure legendary game. Survive as long as you can as you perform crazy stunts and blast through everything in your path, take a splash in the water with whizz and bounce through rollercoaster-style corkscrews, loops and wipe out style hurdles.

How to play:
- Tap on run button to move your stunt man forward
- Tap on back button to move backwards and stop while facing obstacles
- Jump on jump to jump over hurdle
- Touch on sit button to avoid any high obstacle coming towards you

Features:
- Interesting and super cool 3D Characters to choose from.
- Smooth tap and swipe function to control stunt man.
- Whole alot of exciting stunts tasks to complete.
- Orignal 3D visual and ultimate sound effects
- Responsive, excellent and realistic game play.
- Amazing runs & jumping animation in 3D.
